author: bsunanda
body: RecHit for Plan 1 could be a combination of several DetID's and while accessing any condition information it is better be done with the first of the DetId's being used. This is being done in the AssignHit class for HCAL.
title: bsunanda:Run2-hcx111 Correct CaloTower code to account for merged RecHits due to Plan1
